action_1.code:
// Mock BOM data - replace with actual Xano endpoint
const mockBOM = [
  {
    id: "comp-001",
    sku: "COMP-001",
    name: "Main Circuit Board",
    quantity: 1,
    uom: "EA",
    description: "Primary circuit board for the device",
    defaultLocation: "A1-B2",
    onHand: 45
  },
  {
    id: "comp-002", 
    sku: "COMP-002",
    name: "Power Supply Unit",
    quantity: 1,
    uom: "EA",
    description: "12V DC power supply",
    defaultLocation: "A2-C1",
    onHand: 23
  },
  {
    id: "comp-003",
    sku: "COMP-003", 
    name: "Mounting Screws",
    quantity: 4,
    uom: "EA",
    description: "M3x8mm Phillips head screws",
    defaultLocation: "B1-A1",
    onHand: 500
  }
];

return mockBOM;

2645d064-0da3-44e9-a7fb-b331bbf2bdb6.code:
const type = context.component?.props?.['type'] || context.component?.variables?.['popupType'] || 'default'
    if (type === 'delete') return 'lucide/trash-2'
    if (type === 'approve') return 'lucide/check-circle'
    if (type === 'warning') return 'lucide/alert-triangle'
    return 'lucide/help-circle'

f70b7d97-220a-4c86-b656-d624deced39c.code:
const type = context.component?.props?.['type'] || context.component?.variables?.['popupType'] || 'default'
    if (type === 'delete') return '#fecaca'
    if (type === 'approve') return '#bbf7d0'
    if (type === 'warning') return '#fed7aa'
    return '#dbeafe'
